attributes.name: dialogAction
attributes.description: Actions close the `mwc-dialog` on click. You can define an action by slotting an element with the `dialogAction="..."` string attribute. The name of the attribute can be customized by the `actionAttribute` property. When a clickable element with the `dialogAction` attribute is clicked, `mwc-dialog` will get the value of the attribute and fire the `closing` and subsequent `closed` events with a detail of `{action: <clickedElement.getAttribute('dialogAction')>}`.

attributes.name: dialogInitialFocus
attributes.description: `mwc-dialog` initial focus can be set on an element with the `dialogInitialFocus` boolean attribute (configurable via the `initialFocusAttribute` property of `mwc-dialog`.
